name: Small World of Mine
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 38 (Jam).

A game by : Victor Helfter, Kilian Nicol "GhostPandora", Sandra Braconnier "Sanki", Maxime Camps, Arnaud Scieur, "Darkoine"

Small World of Mine is a point and click in wich you visit your brother in the hospital. Your actions determines wether or not he feels better…but it can be at the expense of your own sanity.
